Key Match Events: The Oakland Athletics scored two runs in the top of the 12th inning on three consecutive bunts, breaking a 2-2 tie and eventually winning 4-3.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Houston Astros' division lead remained at 4 1/2 games as the Mariners lost to the Padres.
Others: Houston manager Joe Espada was disappointed in his team's defense in the 12th inning, and Oakland manager Mark Kotsay praised the execution of the bunts.
